Plot: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.
Title: Bicentennial Man
Writer: Isaac Asimov (short story "The Bicentennial Man"), Isaac Asimov (novel), Robert Silverberg (novel), Nicholas Kazan (screenplay)
Actors: Robin Williams, Embeth Davidtz, Sam Neill, Oliver Platt
tomatoConsensus: Bicentennial Man is ruined by a bad script and ends up being dull and mawkish.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 6 nominations.
